title: Insecure FTP Credentials
description: Explore weak password management in an FTP service.
hints: Think about common default passwords used for FTP accounts.
Consider using basic password cracking tools to automate the process.
The username might be something simple like 'ftpuser'.
learningObjectives: Understand how weak credentials can be exploited.
Learn to use automated tools for brute force attacks.
Gain insights into FTP server configurations and security risks.
